Compose:_ðŸ“¢_Flow_Definition_.inputs:
PURPOSE
---------------
Removes all alphabetic characters from a string (both upper & lower case)

INPUTS
---------------
String (string) - a string

OUTPUTS
---------------
String (string) - a string without alphabetic characters

DEP
---------------
No dependencies.
